mapper.select: SELECT USER.ID USER_ID, USER.USERNAME USER_USERNAME, USER.PASSWORD USER_PASSWORD, USER.REMARK USER_REMARK, USER.STATUS USER_STATUS, USER.LEVEL USER_LEVEL, USER.LAST_LOGIN_DATE_TIME USER_LAST_LOGIN_DATE_TIME, USER.UPDATE_SYS_USER_ID USER_UPDATE_SYS_USER_ID, USER.CREATE_SYS_USER_ID USER_CREATE_SYS_USER_ID, USER.UPDATE_DATE_TIME USER_UPDATE_DATE_TIME, USER.CREATE_DATE_TIME USER_CREATE_DATE_TIME, ROLE.ID ROLE_ID, ROLE.NAME ROLE_NAME, ROLE.REMARK ROLE_REMARK, ROLE.STATUS ROLE_STATUS, ROLE.UPDATE_SYS_USER_ID ROLE_UPDATE_SYS_USER_ID, ROLE.CREATE_SYS_USER_ID ROLE_CREATE_SYS_USER_ID, ROLE.UPDATE_DATE_TIME ROLE_UPDATE_DATE_TIME, ROLE.CREATE_DATE_TIME ROLE_CREATE_DATE_TIME, PERMISSION.ID PERMISSION_ID, PERMISSION.NAME PERMISSION_NAME, PERMISSION.REMARK PERMISSION_REMARK, PERMISSION.STATUS PERMISSION_STATUS, PERMISSION.UPDATE_SYS_USER_ID PERMISSION_UPDATE_SYS_USER_ID, PERMISSION.CREATE_SYS_USER_ID PERMISSION_CREATE_SYS_USER_ID, PERMISSION.UPDATE_DATE_TIME PERMISSION_UPDATE_DATE_TIME, PERMISSION.CREATE_DATE_TIME PERMISSION_CREATE_DATE_TIME FROM SYS_USER USER LEFT JOIN SYS_USER_ROLE USER_ROLE ON USER.ID = USER_ROLE.SYS_USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_ROLE ROLE ON USER_ROLE.SYS_ROLE_ID = ROLE.ID LEFT JOIN SYS_ROLE_PERMISSION ROLE_PERMISSION ON ROLE.ID = ROLE_PERMISSION.SYS_ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_PERMISSION PERMISSION ON ROLE_PERMISSION.SYS_PERMISSION_ID = PERMISSION.ID WHERE USER.USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (ROLE.ID IS NULL OR ROLE.STATUS = 'ENABLED') AND (PERMISSION.ID IS NULL OR PERMISSION.STATUS = 'ENABLED')
